# Spells (Alphabetical List - N)
## Na-Ne
**[[Nap Stack (Spell)|Nap Stack]] <sup>M</sup>:** Subjects only need 2 hours for a night’s sleep, and can sleep even longer for more benefits.

**[[Nar Fiendbond (Spell)|Nar Fiendbond]]****:** Subject gains half-fiend template.

**[[Natural Rhythm (Spell)|Natural Rhythm]]:** +1 on damage rolls with each hit (max +5).

**[[Natural Weapon Augmentation (Spell)|Natural Weapon Augmentation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Natural weapon gains special ability with up to +3 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Natural Weapon Augmentation, Greater (Spell)|Natural Weapon Augmentation, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Natural weapon gains special ability with up to +5 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Natural Weapon Augmentation, Lesser (Spell)|Natural Weapon Augmentation, Lesser]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Natural weapon gains special ability with +1 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Natural Weapon Augmentation, Personal (Spell)|Natural Weapon Augmentation, Personal]]****:** One of your natural weapons gains special ability with +1 bonus market price modifier.

**[[Nature's Avatar (Spell)|Nature’s Avatar]]****:** Animal gains +10 on attack rolls and damage rolls, *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*, and 1d8 hp/level.

**[[Nature's Balance (Spell)|Nature’s Balance]]****:** You transfer 4 ability score points to the subject for 10 minutes/level.

**[[Nature's Exile (Spell)|Nature's Exile]]:** Gives subject –10 on [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] checks.

**[[Nature's Favor (Spell)|Nature’s Favor]]****:** Animal touched gains luck bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls of +1/3 levels.

**[[Nature's Purity (Spell)|Nature’s Purity]]****:** Ray deals 2d6 force damage to undead and 5d6 to aberrations.

**[[Nature's Rampart (Spell)|Nature’s Rampart]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You mold the terrain to provide fortifications.

**[[Nature's Wrath (Spell)|Nature’s Wrath]]****:** Damages and dazes aberrations; damages other creatures.

**[[Naturewatch (Spell)|Naturewatch]]****:** As *[[Deathwatch (Spell)|deathwatch]]*, but on animals and plants.

**[[Nauseating Breath (Spell)|Nauseating Breath]]****:** Exhale a cone of nauseating gas.

**[[Nauseating Dart (Spell)|Nauseating Dart]]****:** Poisonous stinger deals 1d2 damage and sickens target.

**[[Nauseating Trail (Spell)|Nauseating Trail]]****:** Creature leaves a trail of *[[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]]* squares.

**[[Near Horizon (Spell)|Near Horizon]]****:** Remove increment-based penalties on ranged attacks.

**[[Necrotic Awareness (Spell)|Necrotic Awareness]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Sense encysted subjects.

**[[Necrotic Bloat (Spell)|Necrotic Bloat]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Encysted subject takes 1d6 damage/level.

**[[Necrotic Burst (Spell)|Necrotic Burst]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Encysted subject killed, cyst begins to roam.

**[[Necrotic Curse (Spell)|Necrotic Curse]]****:** Cure spells in area deal damage, living beings don't heal with rest.

**[[Necrotic Cyst (Spell)|Necrotic Cyst]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Encyst undead sac of tissue in subject.

**[[Necrotic Domination (Spell)|Necrotic Domination]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Completely control encysted subject.

**[[Necrotic Empowerment (Spell)|Necrotic Empowerment]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Draw vigor from mother cyst.

**[[Necrotic Eruption (Spell)|Necrotic Eruption]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Encysted subject killed, those nearby damaged and possibly encysted.

**[[Necrotic Scrying (Spell)|Necrotic Scrying]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Hear or see encysted subject at a distance.

**[[Necrotic Skull Bomb (Spell)|Necrotic Skull Bomb]]****:** Exploding skull releases negative energy; targets each gain 1d4 negative levels.

**[[Necrotic Termination (Spell)|Necrotic Termination]]** **<sup>FX</sup>:** Permanently eliminates encysted subject.

**[[Necrotic Tumor (Spell)|Necrotic Tumor]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Permanently control encysted subject.

**[[Negate Aroma (Spell)|Negate Aroma]]:** Subject cannot be tracked by scent.

**[[Negative Energy Aura (Spell)|Negative Energy Aura]]****:** 10-ft. radius surrounding you deals 1 hp/3 levels for 1 round/level.

**[[Negative Energy Wave (Spell)|Negative Energy Wave]]****:** You release a silent burst of negative energy from your body.

**Negative Reaction:** Targeted creature may not positively influence anyone.

**[[Nerveskitter (Spell)|Nerveskitter]]****:** Subject gains +5 bonus on initiative checks.

**[[Net of Shadows (Spell)|Net of Shadows]]****:** Ordinary shadows that provide concealment to all in the area.

**[[Nether Trail (Spell)|Nether Trail]]****:** Creates a trail compelling evil outsiders to follow.

**[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|Neutralize Poison]]****:** Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

## Nf-Ni
**[[Night's Caress (Spell)|Night’s Caress]]****:** Touched foe take 1d6 points of damage per level plus 1d6+2 Con damage.

**[[Night's Mantle (Spell)|Night's Mantle]]****:** Create an invisible shield that protects a creature from all effects of sunlight.

**[[Nightmare (Spell)|Nightmare]]****:** Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

**[[Nightmare Lullaby (Spell)|Nightmare Lullaby]]:** Subject is [[Confused|confused]].

**[[Nightmare Terrain (Spell)|Nightmare Terrain]]****:** Create patch of illusory terrain that hinders foes and allows you to hide.

**[[Nightshield (Spell)|Nightshield]]:** You gain resistance bonus on saves, and spell absorbs *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]* damage.

**[[Nightstalker's Transformation (Spell)|Nightstalker’s Transformation]] <sup>M</sup>:** Gain +4 Dex, +3 luck bonus to AC, +5 luck bonus on Ref saves, +3d6 sneak attack, and evasion.

**[[Nimbus of Light (Spell)|Nimbus of Light]]:** Light illuminates you until released as an attack.

**[[Nine Lives (Spell)|Nine Lives]] <sup>R</sup>:** Avoid trouble and harmful effects up to nine times.

**[[Nixie's Grace (Spell)|Nixie’s Grace]]:** You gain a swim speed, water breathing, lowlight vision, damage reduction 5/cold iron, and enhancements to Dexterity and Wisdom.

## Nk-No
**[[No Fly Zone (Spell)|No Fly Zone]]:** Forces all flying creatures to the ground.

**[[No Light (Spell)|No Light]]:** Prevents normal light from illuminating.

**[[Node Door (Spell)|Node Door]]:** Allows teleportation between any known nodes.

**[[Node Genesis (Spell)|Node Genesis]] <sup>X</sup>:** Creates a Class 1 node.

**[[Node Lock (Spell)|Node Lock]]:** Deters others from using a node’s powers.

**[[Nondetection (Spell)|Nondetection]] <sup>M</sup>:** Hides subject from divination, scrying.

**Nondetection, Communal <sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**[[Nonesuch Spell (Spell)|Nonesuch Spell]]:** Prevents one 4th-level or lower spell from being cast within 50 feet of you.

**[[Nonesuch Spell, Greater (Spell)|Nonesuch Spell, Greater]]:** Prevents one 7th-level or lower spell from being cast within 100 feet of you.

## Nu-Nz
**[[Numbing Sphere (Spell)|Numbing Sphere]]:** Creates rolling ball of intense cold that deals 1d6 cold damage plus 1d4 Dex damage, lasts 1 round/level.
